'''Seclusion''' is [[Shenhe]]'s [[Level 3 Constellation]].

==Trivia==
=== Etymology===
*{{Lang|1=''Xū''|zh=虚}}, refers to a state of stillness and placidity in Taoism. The {{W|Tao Te Ching|Tao Te Ching}} claims that emptiness is related to the "Tao, the Great Principle, the Creator and Sustainer of everything in the universe".
